title: Alex Jones Show - 2013 Nov 20 WE [sebaygo1]
description:
The Alex Jones Show 
Wednesday, 20 November 2013


[sebaygo1]


Show Description
................

From the Infowars web site :: On the Wednesday, November 20 edition of The Alex Jones Show, Alex examines a startling example of how the state assumes ownership of your children with a story out of Tennessee, in which a student resource officer prevented a father from picking his children up from school by arresting him. 

Alex also covers the normalization of police state compliance and the possible amassing of a biometric database, as roadside saliva and blood tests are conducted on Texas public roads in exchange for money. 

Alex also breaks down Infowars' live streaming coverage of the anniversary of JFK's assassination in Dallas, Texas, and the city's attempts to violate civil liberties by cordoning off the city and telling protesters they can't film or fly banners.

 It is my opinion that in this time it is virtually
 essential to seek information from a variety of sources, 
 to listen to a spectrum of voices in order to better 
 understand the "big picture." A reliance solely upon
 mainstream corporate media for news and info is a 
 prescription for ignorance. I try to share information
 that counters the monotone of mainstream corporate media.
 
 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
 information. Do not assume my support for or endorsement 
 of the contents. 

 Think for yourself!
 To paraphrase the late William Cooper: 
 Read everything, listen to everything, but believe nothing 
 until you've researched it yourself.
